home.type1: Trained at IT Time Academy with solid fundamentals
home.type2: A passionate learner with 2 years of coding experience

about.title: About Me
about.name: Parpiboyev Xurshidbek
about.stext: I'm a Front-End developer with a background in Computer Networking. I focus on building clean, responsive, and user-friendly websites that bring ideas to life.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Showcase
portfolio.text: Explore my journey through projects, certifications, and technical expertise. Each section represents a milestone in my continuous learning path.

1.title: IT Time Academy
1.desc: I studied Frontend at IT Time Academy, learning technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I successfully completed the course and earned a certificate.

card1.name: It Time Academy
card1.text: Multilingual website using React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, i18next, and Particles.js. Supports 4 languages and real-time form submission via Telegram Bot.

card2.name: Noctella
card2.text: Responsive landing page built with React, Zustand, and Tailwind CSS. Includes product search, like system with localStorage, and Telegram Bot integration.

card3.name: Admin panel(AORON)
card3.text: Built with React, Axios, and Fetch for API-based CRUD operations. Tested endpoints using Swagger and Postman. Designed for content management.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: Fill out the form below to contact us. We're happy to receive your questions, suggestions, or collaboration requests. You can also leave a comment to share your thoughts.
